thread.section_title: KISA phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Morag Thomas-Wright
thread.title_full: KISA phone reviewed by Morag Thomas-Wright

author: Morag Thomas-Wright
title: Morag Thomas-Wright
text: I bought this phone for my blind mother. I was surprised that the buttons weren't raised as when you are totally blind you can't find them. We stuck raised buttons on them and my mother memorised the recipients. We had to return the original phone because of a battery fault and the newer phone had raised buttons and is much easier for her to charge. Overall the phone works well and the after sales service is excellent.
